title: Sabbatical Year
cleaned_text: - six years he shall serve: and in the seventh he shall go out free, [Ex. 21:2](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/21.2?lang=eng#p2) ( [Jer. 34:14](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/34.14?lang=eng#p14)). it rest, [Ex. 23:11](/study/scriptures/ot/ex/23.11?lang=eng#p11). - shall the land keep a sabbath, [Lev. 25:2](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/25.2?lang=eng#p2). - What shall we eat the seventh year, [Lev. 25:20](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/25.20?lang=eng#p20). - keep my sabbaths, [Lev. 26:2](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/26.2?lang=eng#p2). - shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, [Lev. 26:34](/study/scriptures/ot/lev/26.34?lang=eng#p34). - every seven years thou shalt make a release, [Deut. 15:1](/study/scriptures/ot/deut/15.1?lang=eng#p1). - as long as she lay desolate she kept sabbath, [2 Chr. 36:21](/study/scriptures/ot/2-chr/36.21?lang=eng#p21). - we would leave the seventh year, [Neh. 10:31](/study/scriptures/ot/neh/10.31?lang=eng#p31). - When will the new moon be gone ... and the sabbath, that we may set
